<title level="1" right="Hazard 19" pfs="">[Castigate the Faithless](/Hazards.aspx?ID=314)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 32</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

Magic forces those who pass by the statue to the ground with sudden force; pressing the bypass button deactivates the trap for 1 minute.

---

**Stealth**
DC 47 (master) or DC 50 (legendary) to notice the bypass button hidden in Urgathoa's skeletal feet

**Disable**
DC 47 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (legendary) to deactivate the trap through prayer, [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (8th level; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC 47) to counteract the trap, or press the bypass button

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Kneel!** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1671), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75)) **Trigger** A creature passes by the statue; **Effect** The trap deals 7d12+40 force damage to the triggering creature (DC 46 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). On a failed save, the creature is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), and on a critical failure, the creature is knocked prone and takes an additional 1d12 bludgeoning damage from the force of the fall.

---
**Reset**
The trap resets automatically if triggered, after 1 minute if the bypass button is pressed, or after 15 minutes if disabled or counteracted.
